lessons.lesson: Lesson 1 等他回电话 Waiting for him to call back

sentences.pinyin: Zhè běn shū de nèi róng hěn hǎo.
sentences.english: The content of this book is good.

sentences.pinyin: Nà běn shū méi shén nèi róng.
sentences.english: That book doesn't have much content.

sentences.chinese: 因为我很忙所以我很累。
sentences.pinyin: Yīn wèi wǒ hěn máng suǒ yǐ wǒ hěn léi.
sentences.english: Because I am very busy, I am tired.

sentences.chinese: 因为他很聪明所以学得很快。
sentences.pinyin: Yīn wèi tā hěn cōng míng suǒ yǐ xué dé hěn kuài.
sentences.english: Because he is intelligent, he learns very fast.

sentences.chinese: 因为太晚了所以我要回家了。
sentences.pinyin: Yīn wèi tài wǎn le suǒ yǐ wǒ yào huí jiā le.
sentences.english: Because it is late, I want to go home.

sentences.pinyin: Tā wèn nǐ shénme?
sentences.english: What did he ask you?

sentences.chinese: 他问我老板的电话号码。
sentences.pinyin: Tā wèn wǒ lǎo bǎn de diànhuà hàomǎ.
sentences.english: He asked me the boss's telephone number.

sentences.pinyin: Qǐng wèn shūdiàn zài nǎ'er?
sentences.english: May I ask where the bookstore is?

sentences.pinyin: Zhè ge wèn tí bù róng yì huí dá.
sentences.english: This question is not easy to answer.

sentences.pinyin: Qǐng nǐ liú gè diànhuà hàomǎ.
sentences.english: Please leave your telephone number.

sentences.pinyin: Qǐng nǐ liú yì zhè jiàn shì.
sentences.english: Please take care of this matter.

sentences.pinyin: Qǐng nǐ liú xià dìzhǐ.
sentences.english: Please leave your address.

sentences.pinyin: Xiànzài shì jiǔ diǎn guò wǔ fēn.
sentences.english: It's now five past nine.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ méi kàn guò zhè běn shū.
sentences.english: I haven't read this book yet.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ méi qù guò táiběi.
sentences.english: I have never been to Taipei.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ huì shuō zhōngwén.
sentences.english: I can speak Chinese.

lessons.lesson: Lesson 2 为什么我无法通过 Why Can’t I Get Through

sentences.pinyin: Diànhuà tōng le ma?
sentences.english: Does the phone work? Can you get through?

sentences.pinyin: Zhè tiáo lù tōng dào nǎ lǐ?
sentences.english: Where does this road lead to?

sentences.pinyin: Diànhuà hái méi tōng.
sentences.english: The telephone doesn't work.

sentences.pinyin: Tā gēn nǐ jiǎng le shénme?
sentences.english: What did he say to you?

sentences.pinyin: Shàng kè de shí hòu bié jiǎng huà.
sentences.english: Don't talk in class.

sentences.pinyin: Lǎoshī zài jiǎngtái shàng jiǎng kè.
sentences.english: The teacher is lecturing on the platform.

sentences.pinyin: Nàgè nù hǎi hěn mírén.
sentences.english: The girl is charming.

sentences.pinyin: Bié chī huài de dōngxī.
sentences.english: Don't eat rotten food.

sentences.pinyin: Diànhuà huài le.
sentences.english: The telephone is out of order.

sentences.pinyin: Méi rén jiē diànhuà.
sentences.english: Nobody answered the phone.

sentences.chinese: 李先生刚说完，张先生又接着说。
sentences.pinyin: Lǐ xiānshēng gāng shuō wán, zhāng xiānshēng yòu jiēzhe shuō.
sentences.english: As soon as Mr. Li finished talking, Mr. Zhang continued to speak.

sentences.pinyin: Zhè ge zì xiě cuò le ma?
sentences.english: Is this word written wrongly?

sentences.pinyin: Zhè jiàn shì de bù cuò.
sentences.english: Is this wrong?

sentences.pinyin: Zhè běn shū xiě dé bù cuò.
sentences.english: This book is not bad.

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ yǒu méi yǒu tīng jiàn shénme shì?
sentences.english: Have you heard anything?

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ tīng jiàn lǐng shēn le ma?
sentences.english: Have you heard the bell?

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ xǐ huān tīng shénme gē?
sentences.english: What songs do you like to listen to?

sentences.pinyin: Zhè shǒu gē hěn hǎo tīng.
sentences.english: This song sounds pleasant.

lessons.lesson: Lesson 3 到我家来玩 Come to My Home

sentences.pinyin: Zhōu mò
sentences.english: weekend

sentences.pinyin: Zhōu mù lái wǒ jiā wán hǎo ma?
sentences.english: Come over to my house this weekend, ok?

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ zhuó mò bu chū qù ma?
sentences.english: Don't you go out on the weekend?

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zhōu mò duō bàn zài jiā.
sentences.english: No, I usually stay at home.

sentences.pinyin: Zhǐ
sentences.english: Location

sentences.pinyin: Dì zhǐ
sentences.english: Address

sentences.pinyin: Qǐng gào sù wǒ nǐ de dì dì zhǐ.
sentences.english: Please tell me your address.

sentences.chinese: 你知道梅花饭店的地址吗？
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ zhī dào méi huā fàn diàn dì dì zhǐ ma?
sentences.english: Do you know where the Plum Blossoms Restaurant is?

sentences.pinyin: Zhè ge dì zhǐ bù hǎo zhǎo.
sentences.english: This place is not easy to find.

sentences.pinyin: Xiàng
sentences.english: Like, seem

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ hǎo xiàng hěn lèi.
sentences.english: You seem to be very tired.

sentences.pinyin: Tā hǎo xiàng hěn xǐ huān chàng gē.
sentences.english: He seems to like singing.

sentences.pinyin: Zhè liǎng gè dì fāng hěn xiǎng.
sentences.english: These two places are very much alike.

sentences.pinyin: Zhè zhāng huà hěn xiǎng nà zhāng.
sentences.english: This painting is very much like that one.

sentences.pinyin: Tā hěn xiǎng tā de mǔ qīn.
sentences.english: He is much like his mother.

sentences.pinyin: Jì
sentences.english: Remember, take down

sentences.pinyin: Yòng bǐ jì xià lái.
sentences.english: Please take it down.

sentences.pinyin: Jì zài běn zi shàng.
sentences.english: Please write it down in the notebook.

sentences.chinese: 我告诉你的事你记住了吗？
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ gào sù nǐ de shì nǐ jì zhù le ma?
sentences.english: Do you remember what I told you?

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ jì zhù le.
sentences.english: I remember.

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ jì dé nà gè rén ma?
sentences.english: Do you remember that man?

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ jì dé.
sentences.english: I remember him.

sentences.pinyin: Bié wàng jì gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà.
sentences.english: Don't forget to call me.

sentences.pinyin: Mí
sentences.english: Spellbound, enchanted, charmed, become lost

sentences.pinyin: Tā ràng diànnǎo mí zhùle.
sentences.english: He is spellbound by the computer.

sentences.pinyin: Tā hěn mí diànnǎo.
sentences.english: He is infatuated with the computer.

sentences.pinyin: Nàgè nù hǎi hěn mírén.
sentences.english: The girl is charming.

sentences.pinyin: Zài shānshàng hěn róng yì mílù.
sentences.english: It’s easy to get lost in the mountain.

lessons.lesson: Lesson 5 我如何到达那里 How do I Get There?

sentences.pinyin: Xíng
sentences.english: company, conduct, line

sentences.pinyin: Zhè zhǒng xíngwéi shì bù duì de.
sentences.english: Such conduct is wrong.

sentences.pinyin: Zhè zhāng zhǐ shàng yǒu sān xíng zì.
sentences.english: There are three lines of words on this paper.

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ dào yínháng qù zuò shénme?
sentences.english: Why did you go to the bank?

sentences.pinyin: Rán
sentences.english: But, same as

sentences.pinyin: Duō liànxí, zìrán jiù huìle.
sentences.english: If you practice more, then you will be able to do it.

sentences.pinyin: Xuéshēng dànrán yīnggāi yòng gōng.
sentences.english: Students should have to study hard.

sentences.chinese: 我们先买东西，然后吃饭。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒmen xiān mǎi dōng xī, rán hòu chī fàn.
sentences.english: We’ll buy something first, and then have some food.

sentences.pinyin: Tiáo
sentences.english: A classifier for some thing narrow and long

sentences.pinyin: Zhè tiáo lù hěn zhí.
sentences.english: This road is straight.

sentences.pinyin: Zhè tiáo lù shì wān de.
sentences.english: That road is curvy.

sentences.chinese: 你知道这条路通哪里吗？
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ zhīdào zhè tiáo lù tōng nǎlǐ ma?
sentences.english: Do you know where this road leads to?

sentences.chinese: 我昨天那买了一条裤子。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zuótiān nà mǎi le yī tiáo kùzi.
sentences.english: Yesterday I bought a pair of trousers.

sentences.chinese: 我买的那条裤子是绿的。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ mǎi de nà tiáo kùzǐ shì lǜ de.
sentences.english: The trousers I bought are green.
